name: Imagiworld: The Handsome Remake
description:
[under development]

This is a remake of the first game I ever made...

In this game, you controll Zach, a.... BEAN!?

Man... Who the hell made this script? This doesn’t make any sense!

Actually, was me, 2 years ago... And now, it’s time to show to the younger me, that I improved my game Dev skills a lot!

(For now, I only have the DEMO, and the full game will cost 1 dollar [or two, idk])
